TableInfo.QueryValue: SELECT CODEID, SYMBOL, TICKSIZE, FROMPRICE, TOPRICE FROM SECURITIES_TICKSIZE WHERE STATUS='Y'

SELECT SEC.CODEID, ISS.FULLNAME, SEC.SYMBOL, SEC.TRADELOT, SEC.TRADEUNIT, SEC.OPENPRICE, SEC.CEILINGPRICE, SEC.FLOORPRICE, SEC.BASICPRICE, SEC.CURRPRICE, SEC.MARGINPRICE, SBSEC.HALT, DECODE(SBSEC.TRADEPLACE,'001','10','002','02','005','04') FLOORCODE, SBSEC.TRADEPLACE, SBSEC.SECTYPE, AL.CDCONTENT SECTYPENAME, al.en_cdcontent SECTYPENAMEEN, DECODE(SBSEC.SECTYPE,'001',2,'011',4,'012',12,'006',1,'003',1,'222',1,'444',1,'008',3,'111',3,0) STOCKTYPE, NVL(V.START_QTTY,0) START_QTTY,NVL(V.MIN_QTTY,0) MIN_QTTY,NVL(V.MAX_QTTY,0) MAX_QTTY,NVL(V.MIN_CNT,0) MIN_CNT,NVL(V.MAX_CNT,0) MAX_CNT FROM ISSUERS ISS, SECURITIES_INFO SEC, SBSECURITIES SBSEC, ALLCODE AL, VW_SPLIT_ORDER_PARAMETERS V WHERE ISS.ISSUERID = SBSEC.ISSUERID AND SBSEC.CODEID = SEC.CODEID AND al.cdtype='SA' AND AL.CDNAME='SECTYPE' AND AL.CDVAL=SBSEC.SECTYPE AND SBSEC.SECTYPE IN ('001','008','003','011','012') AND SBSEC.TRADEPLACE=V.TRADEPLACE(+) AND SBSEC.TRADEPLACE IN ('001','002','005') --AND EXISTS(SELECT VARVALUE FROM SYSVAR WHERE VARNAME='HOSTATUS' AND VARVALUE<>'0')

SELECT DECODE(NAME,'VN30','-2','HNX30','-4','HOSE','-11','HNX','-12','UPCOM','-13','OTC','-14') ID, S.* FROM ( SELECT TRADEPLACE NAME, COLLECTIONTOSTRING(CAST(COLLECT(SYMBOL ORDER BY SYMBOL) AS COLLECTION), ',') SYMBOLS, '0' LISTTYPE FROM (SELECT SYMBOL, A.CDCONTENT TRADEPLACE FROM SBSECURITIES SE, ALLCODE A WHERE SE.TRADEPLACE = A.CDVAL AND A.CDNAME = 'TRADEPLACE' AND CDTYPE = 'SE' AND SE.SECTYPE IN ('001', '003', '008','011','012') AND SE.TRADEPLACE NOT IN ('006') ORDER BY SE.TRADEPLACE, SE.SYMBOL ASC) GROUP BY TRADEPLACE UNION SELECT * FROM WATCHLIST WHERE (NAME IN ('HNX30','VN30') OR LISTTYPE = '1') )S
